content: builtin/rules 目录下有15个规则文件：clean_architecture.md, clean_code.md, code_review.md, documentation.md, generate_rules.md, ignore_all_alerts.md, ios-dark-theme.md, ios-light-theme.md, performance.md, refactoring.md, rust_performance.md, sdd.md, security.md, solid.md, tdd.md。已创建 builtin_rules.md 作为规则入口文件，使用 Jinja2 模板语法和 {{ rule_file_dir }} 变量动态生成路径。
